code: import apiClient from'./client';class CompanyService{async getCompanies(){const response=await apiClient.get('/v1/companies');return response.data;}async getCompanyById(id){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/companies/".concat(id));return response.data;}async createCompany(companyData){const response=await apiClient.post('/v1/companies',companyData);return response.data;}async updateCompany(id,companyData){const response=await apiClient.put("/v1/companies/".concat(id),companyData);return response.data;}async deleteCompany(id){await apiClient.delete("/v1/companies/".concat(id));}}const companyService=new CompanyService();export default companyService;
